TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_byacing_(riyax), title = byacing_(riyax), year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/byacing_(riyax)} }

S.FORM: Byacing (riyax) hya' ga lpgan na riyax qaniy hya. lpgan na 'tayal sraral hya' ga, magal squ psbahan aring hmbku' byacing ruw mtbalay byacing ruw mucing sa mpuzyut lawziy qu sinxalan lmpuw na 'tayal.
Byacing (riyax) hya' ga lpgan na riyax qaniy hya. lpgan na 'tayal sraral hya' ga, magal sqo psbahan aring hmbko' byacing row mtbalay byacing row mocing sa mpozyot lawziy qo sinxalan lmpow na 'tayal.
